nodes.text: A male Human hailing from the planet of Naboo worked as a droid designer for Serv-O-Droid, Inc. in the last decades of the Galactic Republic, along with his wife. After years on the staff of that company, they retired to their homeworld. In 32 BBY, in the months following the Battle of Naboo, the couple helped Master of Sciences Graf Zapalo conceive the ER-1 probe droid in hopes of creating a complete map of the many tunnels that ran below the Naboo's landmasses and ocean floors.
